[[Hardbottle]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1265}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Boffin Family|Boffin]] | parentage=[[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]] | siblings=[[Hugo Boffin|Hugo]], [[Uffo Boffin|Uffo]] and [[Rollo Boffin|Rollo]] | spouse=[[Blanco Bracegirdle]] | children=[[Bruno Bracegirdle|Bruno]] and [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins|Lobelia]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Primrose Bracegirdle, née Boffin''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Primrose was the daughter of [[Otto Boffin]] and [[Lavender Grubb]]. She married [[Blanco Bracegirdle]] and had two children, [[Bruno Bracegirdle|Bruno]] in {{SR|1313}} and [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins|Lobelia]] in {{SR|1318}}.{{App|Boffin}} ==Etymology== [[wikipedia:Primula vulgaris|Primrose]] (from Latin ''primula'' and English ''rose'') are plants of the [[wikipedia:primula|primula]] genus of the [[wikipedia:Primulaceae|primrose family]]. {{references}} [[Category:Boffin]] [[Category:Bracegirdle]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[Category:Greco-Roman names]] [[de:Primrose Straffgürtel]] [[fi:Leinikki Boffin]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hobbits/bophin/primevere bophin]]
